description: On the lawn the sight of Steve Hunt (AKA Enrico Tarantino), settledagainst a tree studying, stirs horny Lucio Maverick to unbridled manheat, and they get naked for a hip-pumping fuck fest with Mavericktopping. Impromptu quickies like that are more the rule than theexception.
title: College Cocks 2, Scene #02
